description: Try our easy to follow Tomato & Capsicum Relish recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Relish,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Tomato,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Tomato & Capsicum Relish Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place tomato, onion, capsicum and garlic in a large saucepan. Slowly bring to the boil. Simmer over medium heat, stirring frequently, for 20-25 minutes.
Stir in sugar, cumin, 2 tsp salt and vinegar. Simmer for 1 hour, stirring occasionally, until thick. Remove from heat. Spoon into sterilised jars. Seal until ready to use.
